sections.heading: Satisfaction of separate obligation with separate propertyIf a spouse uses separate property during the existence of the community property regime to satisfy the separate obligation of the other spouse, the spouse whose property was used is entitled to reimbursement for the amount or value the prope
sections.text: Satisfaction of separate obligation with separate propertyIf a spouse uses separate property during the existence of the community property regime to satisfy the separate obligation of the other spouse, the spouse whose property was used is entitled to reimbursement for the amount or value the property had at the time it was used.Acts 2009, No. 204, ยง1.
